message.body: Should I order the chromebook with you 9512 Visa?
I have to order before 5 to get it by Thursday...
Your info doesn't seem to available in my Amazon. It's probably safer to send it home. Either you can order it on my account or you can give me your info.
Ooooo. This guy at work just sent me a link to a book about valuing video game societies. Crazy.
